title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
oldiers - surely this isn't safe? And we'll just pat the dragon on the head, I suppose? Let's go. Leave.

Choosing dialogue 4 will end the dialogue sequence and give you an journal update on The Githyanki Warrior. Head to the other Githyanki with a dragon. Lae'zel will speak with Kith'rak Voss, but he will ask for her name due to the tone she speaks to him with. You will have the following dialogue options.

Nod to Lae'zel. Go ahead. I will be speaking on her behalf, gith.
